Harley Quinn (1992-2014) Batman Animated Cartoon Series COMPLETE 

COLLECTION All Episodes


Created for all the Harley Quinn fans!!!

This is my first torrent creation.  I have been enjoying 

downloads for years and have always wanted to create one, but it 

seems that anything I thought of was already uploaded.  With the 

announcement of the new new Suicide Squad 2016 movie, I became 

curious about Harley Quinn's origins.  So I looked into it and 

discovered that her comic book origin collection had already 

been created, but not her animated cartoon origins.  Thus, this 

torrent was created.   

I deserve no credit.  This is just a collection of other video 

files that I have combined together.  I changed the files names 

so that they are all uniformly labeled so that they may be 

played easily in chronological order.  It contains all of the 

episodes in which HARLEY QUINN makes an appearance and also 

movies and tv specials.  It contains every episode from her 

debut in the 1992 Batman Animated Series episode "Joker's Favor" 

to the 2015 online webisode "Twisted".  I did not encode or rip 

any of these files except for the Gotham Girls (2002) episodes.  

Gotham Girls was originally in Shockwave Flash format that I 

converted to mp4's for easy viewing.  I used freeware to do it 

so they have a watermark in the upper left corner, but it 

doesn't affect the videos.  I also included the original 

Shockwave files encase you wanted to view them in their original 

format.

Harley Quinn plays major supporting role in most of the episodes 

except for a few.  She has small cameo appearances in the Robot 

Chickens, Lego Batman, and Batman Beyond to name a few, but 

nevertheless she's in them so I included them.  Overall, I am 

pretty pleased with how it turned out.  

I'd like to say thank you to the piratebay and all the seeders 

for making information and entertainment easily accessible to 

all.


0nixx
